title: You STILL CAN'T gift icons!
body:
So what happened to  gifting icons Riot? I wanted to send some Worlds icons for my friends, but there is no option to do so.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KjRZrQrd-summoner-icon-gifting-gone?comment=0000

2 MONTHS! I expected a fix before but it's not fixed. I mean come on...

replies.body: Me and my boyfriend where suppose to have matching icons for our anniversary, but riot is taking a thousand years to get its life together and fix the icon thing. I don't know why they would throw away another means of them getting money. I'm not buying anymore r p until they fix this. This is why i barley even play league anymore, glitches for days....
get this sorted. my club mate wanted to buy me an icon i missed out on and couldn't. he wanted to do it because i always gift people presents. finally i was gonna get something back for a change..
I mean, its unfortunate u need to buy rp for them i want to give them 240 rp worth not 490 rp which is 5$.... why cant we gift a customizable amount

Unfortunately, the gifting system's interaction with these Icons is pretty complicated. While we don't have gifting for these enabled, you can still ensure your friends can grab one by gifting them RP [through the client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
